com.authlete.cbor

Class CBOROutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • com.authlete.cbor.CBOROutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class CBOROutputStream
extends FilterOutputStream
    An output stream to write CBOR representations of Java primitives and instances of common Java classes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.FilterOutputStream

    • Method Detail

      • writeBoolean

        public CBORBoolean writeBoolean(boolean value)
                         throws IOException
        Write the CBOR representation of the given value into this output stream.

        The implementation of this method cborizes the given value with CBORizer.cborizeBoolean(boolean) and calls the encode(OutputStream) method with this output stream.

        Parameters:
        value - A value to be encoded and written into this output stream.
        Returns:
        A CBORBoolean instance that corresponds to the given value.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Write the CBOR representation of the given value into this output stream.

        The implementation of this method cborizes the given value with CBORizer.cborizeBigInteger(BigInteger) and calls the encode(OutputStream) method with this output stream.

        Parameters:
        value - A value to be encoded and written into this output stream.
        Returns:
        A CBORBigInteger instance or CBORNull.INSTANCE that corresponds to the given value.
